Package io.anserini.ltr

Class BaseFeatureExtractor<K>

java.lang.Object
io.anserini.ltr.BaseFeatureExtractor<K>
Direct Known Subclasses:
TwitterFeatureExtractor, WebFeatureExtractor
public abstract class BaseFeatureExtractor<K>
extends java.lang.Object
Feature extractor class that forms the base for other feature extractors

      qid - Qrel Id
      qrel - The Qrel relevance value
      docId - The stored Doc Id
      features - The feature vector in featureNum:value form
